snippet: Japan sought international backing on Wednesday for its plan to resume whale hunting in the Antarctic next year, despite a ruling against it by the top United Nations court.
abstract: Japan seeks international backing for its plan to resume whale hunting in the Antarctic in 2015, despite a ruling against it by the top United Nations court.
lead_paragraph: Japan sought international backing on Wednesday for its plan to resume whale hunting in the Antarctic next year, despite a ruling against it by the top United Nations court.

headline.main: Slovenia: Japan Seeks to Resume Whale Hunting
headline.print_headline: Slovenia: Japan Seeks to Resume Whale Hunting
